Job_Description:
We are looking for a talented Data Scientist to join our IT Data & Analytics team in Bangalore. This is an amazing opportunity to work on a wide variety of projects catering to multiple business teams within Clarivate. The team consists of 9 people and is reporting to the Senior Manager of Data & Analytics. By joining us you will have the opportunity to develop machine learning and AI models for a variety of high priority strategic projects that enable our business teams to discover new insights and empower them to take the right decisions.

Do you have a passion for data and a knack for Python? We're seeking a talented intern to join our dynamic data science team!
What you'll do:
Assist our data scientists with tasks like data analysis, machine learning exploration, and creating insightful reports.
Gain valuable hands-on experience in a fast-paced environment.
Learn from experienced data professionals and strengthen your Python skills.
What you'll gain:
Real-world experience in data science.
Mentorship from industry experts.
The opportunity to explore the exciting field of data science.
Potential for a full-time position upon successful completion of the internship (mention this benefit prominently).
Requirements:
Strong proficiency in Python.
Familiarity with data analysis concepts (a plus).
Bonus points for:
Experience with Power BI for data visualization.
Understanding of data structures and SQL.
Knowledge of DAX (Data Analysis Expressions) for Power BI.
Join us and take your first step into a rewarding career in data science!

Job Purpose

About this opportunity:
Ericsson is looking for a dedicated, innovative, and proactive Data Scientist to join our team. This role gives you the chance to leverage your machine learning expertise to directly influence business outcomes. You will be responsible for developing innovative scientific methods, processes, and systems. This includes distilling valuable insights from data and driving the future of applied analytics at Ericsson. A strong grasp of both traditional and cutting-edge machine learning techniques and applications is essential to fulfilling this role.
What you will do:

Job Information
Industry
IT Services
Salary
35 to 38 LPA
Work Experience
6-8 years
City
Noida
State/Province

Profile Requirements
Analyze and dig out carefully vetted, actionable insights from (mostly! pre-cleaned) data.
Turn insights into precise changes in the system; applying a toolset including calculus, statistical modeling, advanced algorithms, and machine learning to create measurable dollar impact.
Scale and generalize forecasting models and optimization algorithms to handle requirements from new markets and clients.
Travel and engage clients directly to translate their business needs into implementable science.
Fundamental math and designing robust algorithms from scratch excites you (as opposed to just running boost.fit).
